name: Bloodbath Requiem
description:
After Bloodbath Kavkaz Shamil Rakhmanov, a Moscow hero, has left the city, disillusioned with people and the world. He thought the evil was thrown down and everything was in order.
He was wrong. Heroes are often wrong.
And now, in 2027, everything is even worse. The future Russia is a cruel place divided into restricted militarized zones controlled by omnipotent Roscorp Inc. Roscorp Inc rules everything, and it seems that no one can stop its reign.
No one but Shamil Rakhmanov! Because he will be back in Bloodbath Requiem to inflict vengeance, exterminate evil and do the right thing.
He will be back to eat shawarma and kick some asses! And, believe me, he will run out of shawarma very soon.
Bloodbath Requiem is a fast and dynamic top-down shooter inspired by Hotline Miami, which will kick your ass in a Russian style.
Dagestan Technology again are off to kick your ass, and you'd better be prepared. Are you ready? You were warned!Features
  • Bloodbath – dynamic firefights, updated camera, reworked slow-mo and, of course, mad action!
  • The Future Moscow – the capital of Russia in the future is very cruel and dangerous place inspired by cult classic like "Blade Runner", but full of Russian atmosphere.
  • Lots of locations – action will take place in a lot of regions, because Moscow is a big city.
  • Branching dialogue tree – the second chapter, unlike the first, will focus on a non-linear plot.
  • A unique soundtrack – by a good artist Pavel Perepelitsa.
  • A diverse armor – not only real armor is mixed up with the imaginary one, but Shamil also can hold different armor in different hands! Lazer in one hand and AK in another? Or you want to leave another hand free and use your fist? It's up to you to decide!
  • Also, we have editor – you won't have to wait for a year like... well, it doesn't matter. Now you can create not only locations but game scenarios, dialogues and interface.
